subject: As articles move from machine to machine, each machine adds its own identifier to the article's Path field, using the UUCP bang-style notation.
body:
The limousines stop, and Nipponese people start to climb out.

WATCH OJU.F TRADE LIKE CRAZY!
THIS FRANKFURT STOCK IS
GOING THROUGH THE ROOF!

COMPANY: ORAMED PHARMA
SYMBOL: OJU.F
PRICE: 0.60
TARGET: 2.15
WKN : A0J3FG
ISIN : US68403P1049

WE ARE PREDICTING AMAZING
GAINS ON THIS ONE!
BE PART OF IT! ADD IT TO
YOUR PORTFOLIO!
WATCH OJU.F!!!

Comments Whenever a menu changes (whether or not the 
menu resides in a window that is displayed), the application should call 
DrawMenuBar.
